reviewText: I love this movie - it's madcap humor, a bit like turning the Marx Brothers loose on the shores of the Danube. But although we have "Underground" (which is also a wonderful film) and a couple of others in Region 1 encoding, so far, no "Black Cat, White Cat"! Would some studio/distributor PLEASE give us a Region 1 release of this?? It deserves a wider audience in the U.S. and Canada.
